subMembers.name: Configuration
subMembers.description: An object defining configuration properties for the Calendar UI component.

subMembers.name: cellComponent
subMembers.description: An alias for the [cellTemplate] property specified in React. Accepts a custom component. Refer to [Using a Custom Component] for more information.

subMembers.name: cellRender
subMembers.description: An alias for the [cellTemplate] property specified in React. Accepts a rendering function. Refer to [Using a Rendering Function] for more information.

subMembers.name: cellTemplate
subMembers.description: Specifies a custom template for calendar cells.

subMembers.name: currentDate
subMembers.description: Specifies a date displayed on the current calendar page.

subMembers.name: dateSerializationFormat
subMembers.description: Specifies the date-time value serialization format.

subMembers.name: disabledDates
subMembers.description: Specifies dates that users cannot select.

subMembers.name: firstDayOfWeek
subMembers.description: Specifies the first day of a week.

subMembers.name: max
subMembers.description: The latest date the UI component allows to select.

subMembers.name: maxZoomLevel
subMembers.description: Specifies the maximum [zoom level] of the calendar.

subMembers.name: min
subMembers.description: The earliest date the UI component allows to select.

subMembers.name: minZoomLevel
subMembers.description: Specifies the minimum [zoom level] of the calendar.

subMembers.name: selectWeekOnClick
subMembers.description: Specifies whether a user can select a week by clicking on a week number.

subMembers.name: selectionMode
subMembers.description: Specifies one of three selection modes: single, multiple, or range.

subMembers.name: showTodayButton
subMembers.description: Specifies whether or not the UI component displays a button that selects the current date.

subMembers.name: showWeekNumbers
subMembers.description: Specifies whether to display a column with week numbers.

subMembers.name: value
subMembers.type: Date | Number | String | null | Array<Date, Number, String, null>
subMembers.description: An object or a value that specifies the date and time selected in the calendar.

subMembers.name: zoomLevel
subMembers.description: Specifies the current calendar zoom level.

properties.name: dxCalendar
properties.description: The Calendar is a UI component that displays a calendar and allows an end user to select the required date within a specified date range.

Methods.name: reset(value)
Methods.description: Resets the [value] property to the value passed as an argument.

Events.name: onDisposing
Events.description: A function that is executed before the UI component is [disposed of].md '{basewidgetpath}/Methods/#dispose').

Events.name: onInitialized
Events.description: A function used in JavaScript frameworks to save the UI component instance.

Events.name: onOptionChanged
Events.description: A function that is executed after a UI component property is changed.

Events.name: onValueChanged
Events.description: A function that is executed after the UI component's [value] is changed.

Types.name: CalendarSelectionMode
Types.description: Specifies one of three selection modes: single, multiple, or range.

Types.name: CalendarZoomLevel
Types.description: Specifies the current calendar zoom level.

Types.name: DisabledDate
Types.description: Specifies dates that users cannot select.

Types.name: DisposingEvent
Types.description: The type of the [disposing] event handler's argument.

Types.name: InitializedEvent
Types.description: The type of the [initialized] event handler's argument.

Types.name: OptionChangedEvent
Types.description: The type of the [optionChanged] event handler's argument.

Types.name: ValueChangedEvent
Types.description: The type of the [valueChanged] event handler's argument.
